lead_paragraph: Philadelphia re-signed the free-agent forward Simon Gagné to a five-year contract last night, ending a summer of difficult negotiations. The 26-year-old Gagné, a former first-round pick, is coming off the best season of his career, scoring 47 goals and collecting 79 points.
